page.title: 03CLUBS
page.content:
FRIENDS OF LYNEAL SCHOOL The group organises events to make money for the school. Friends meet at the school. It was formed in January 1985.
BETTISFIELD YOUTH CLUB There is a youth club with 93 members. Their activities include table tennis, pool, snooker, darts, badminton, swimming, rounders and ice skating. The members come from up to 10 miles away. Their ages range from 8 to 25 years old.
WOMENS' INSTITUTES There are two, Lyneal_cum_Colemere and Bettisfield. Activities include sewing, cooking, First Aid, gardening, games and drama as well as competitions.
